@graph.title: Chemistry of advanced materials : an overview
@graph.abstract: Introductory terms and concepts / Mark J. Hampden-Smith, Leonard V. Interrante -- Electron-transfer salt-based conductors, superconductors, and magnets / Patrick Cassoux, Joel S. Miller -- Advanced polymeric materials : functional electroactive polymers / Bashir M. Sheikh-Ali, Gary E. Wnek -- Polymers in electronics / E. Reichmanis, T.X. Neenan -- Chemical vapor deposition / Mark J. Hampden-Smith, Toivo T. Kodas, Audunn Ludviksson -- Introduction to the nonlinear optical properties of organic materials / Fabienne Meyers, Seth R. Marder, Joseph W. Perry -- Nanoparticles and nanostructural materials / Kenneth J. Klabunde, Cathy Mohs -- Nanoporous materials / Peter T. Tanev, Jean-R(c)♭mi Butruille, Thomas J. Pinnavaia -- Molecular precursor routes to inorganic solids / Jacques Livage, C. Sanchez, F. Babonneau -- Layered transition metal oxides and chalcogenides / Paul A. Salvador ...
